attributes.action: Stop charging Londoners for the 2012 Olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many Londoners would like to know how 'we' voted for the Olympics to be staged here. We are being charged for something we didnt want here. The transport system cannot support London now let alone when we have all visitors for the Olympics. WE SHOULD NOT BE CHARGED IN OUR COUNCIL TAX FOR THIS EVENT TO BE STAGED .
